460450.name: Sisters Demo
460450.description:
A room scale 5 minute demo for Otherworld Interactive's Sisters franchise. You find yourself alone in the house with only a flash light to help you. Experience a light interactive haunting.

Sisters is currently in production. This demo isn't representative of the final gameplay but will give you an idea of the thrills and chills you can expect from the final. We hope you enjoy our demo and look forward to the final experience! For more scary dolls be sure to check out Sisters mobile VR companion app on Android or iOS.
460450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
